headline: Pivot Bio CEO to Spotlight the Commercial Opportunity of Sustainability and Innovation in Agriculture at Climate Week NYC
summary: Pivot Bio, one of the world's most innovative agtech companies, will take center stage during Climate Week in New York City (Sept. 22–24). CEO Chris Abbott will join global business and sustainability leaders to highlight how agriculture is advancing climate solutions, reducing costs and strengthening the economic resilience of rural communities.
